Posts.Content: Bible wrote: Hello.. My first post on this site. My recent biopsy shows ADH. I am waiting to be scheduled for surgery. Not sure at this point to expect except this will gather larger sample of suspicious cells. I had the mammo-spbb needle core biopsy. Needless to say Iam concerned. Has anyone had this? Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Biopsy shows Atypical Ductal Hyperplasia Bible Ddw79
